summary: STARTED HAVING PROBLEMS WITH THE CIGARETTE LIGHTER (USED FOR CELL PHONE CHARGER) SHORTING OUT - PULLED FUSE SO IT'S WOULDN'T START A FIRE.  THEN AT THE END OF JUNE AIR CONDITIONER STARTED GOING ON AND OFF WHEN I WOULD HIT A BUMP.  FINALLY WENT COMPLETELY OUT AND NOW BEING TOLD WIRING HARNESS HAS TO BE COMPLETELY REPLACED.  KIA WILL NOT PAY FOR BECAUSE MY WARRANTY IS OUT! SCARED TO DRIVE IT BECAUSE THEY SAID WIRES ARE MELTING!!    *NLM
